explanation: [0-0] A man in a black T-shirt is standing in a factory, holding a white tube, next to a machine that produces bubble wrap.

[0-4] The man turns the large bubble wrap on the right, using the white tube to wrap the bubble wrap around the metal rod in the middle of the machine, ensuring that the bubble wrap is wrapped around the metal rod. The bubble wrap has been wrapped around once, and the man cuts the bubble wrap with a utility knife.
